properties.areaDesc: St. Joseph; La Porte; Berrien; Cass; Marshall; Starke; Elkhart; Kosciusko
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 19 at 4:37PM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
At 436 PM EST/336 PM CST/, an area of heavy snow was located along a
line extending from 10 miles northwest of Shorewood-Tower Hill to
near Buchanan to near Wakarusa. Movement was southwest at 15 mph.
Visibility will rapidly deteriorate as this band moves south across
the advised area. Widespread visibility within this band will range
from one half mile to one mile with localized visibility briefly
dropping to one quarter mile. Additional snowfall of one half inch
to one inch possible with this band.

Locations impacted include...
South Bend, Elkhart, Mishawaka, Goshen, Michigan City, La Porte,
Warsaw, Niles, Plymouth, Nappanee, Westville, Winona Lake, Bremen,
Buchanan, Georgetown, Trail Creek, Granger, Dunlap, Gulivoire Park
and Osceola.

This includes the following highways...
Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 38 and 90.
Interstate 94 in Indiana between mile markers 33 and 45.
Interstate 94 in Michigan between mile markers 0 and 22.

Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be
prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra
time when traveling.

NWSheadline: AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT WESTERN ELKHART...ST. JOSEPH... WESTERN KOSCIUSKO...NORTHEASTERN STARKE...MARSHALL...LA PORTE... SOUTHWESTERN CASS AND SOUTHERN BERRIEN COUNTIES
